Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
ControlFunction = Tool:WaitForChild("ControlFunction")
Animations = { {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("Swing1"), Duration = 1.25, Speed = 1.25, Damage = 20}, {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("Swing2"), Duration = 0.75, Speed = 2.5, Damage = 25}, {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("Swing3"), Duration = 0.5, Speed = 3, Damage = 15}, {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("Swing4"), Duration = 0.9, Speed = 1.5, Damage = 30}, {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("Swing5"), Duration = 1, Speed = 1, Damage = 30}, {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("Swing6"), Duration = 0.75, Speed = 2, Damage = 30}, {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("Swing7"), Duration = 1, Speed = 3, Damage = 30}, }
Special = Tool:WaitForChild("Special")
LastAnimUsed = nil AnimReused = 0
function ChooseAnimation() local AnimChosen = Animations[math.random(1, #Animations)] AnimReused = ((AnimChosen == LastAnimUsed and (AnimReused + 1)) or 0) if AnimChosen ~= LastAnimUsed or AnimReused <= 1 then LastAnimUsed = AnimChosen return AnimChosen else return ChooseAnimation() end end
function Activated() if not Humanoid or not Humanoid.Parent or Humanoid.Health == 0 or SpecialActive or not Tool.Enabled then return end Tool.Enabled = false if SwingAnim then SwingAnim:Stop() end local AnimChosen = ChooseAnimation() SwingAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(AnimChosen.Animation) if SwingAnim then SwingAnim:Play(nil, nil, AnimChosen.Speed) AnimPlaying = AnimChosen end pcall(function() ControlFunction:InvokeServer("AnimationPlaying", {Name = AnimChosen.Animation.Name, Duration = AnimChosen.Duration, Damage = AnimChosen.Damage}) end) wait(AnimChosen.Duration) if SwingAnim then SwingAnim:Stop() end AnimPlaying = nil wait(ReloadTime) Tool.Enabled = true end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not Character or not Player or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 then return end if not Tool.Enabled then wait(ReloadTime) Tool.Enabled = true end Mouse.KeyDown:connect(function(Key) Key = Key:lower() if Key == "q" then local SpecialSuccessful = false pcall(function() SpecialSuccessful = ControlFunction:InvokeServer("KeyDown", Key) end) if SpecialSuccessful then SwingAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Special) if SwingAnim then SwingAnim:Play(nil, nil, 0.5) end local UnequippedCheck = false local UnequippedConnection UnequippedConnection = Tool.Unequipped:connect(function() UnequippedCheck = true UnequippedConnection:disconnect() end) wait(2) if UnequippedConnection then UnequippedConnection:disconnect() end if not UnequippedCheck and SwingAnim then SwingAnim:Stop() end end end end) end
function Unequipped() if SwingAnim then SwingAnim:Stop() end AnimPlaying = nil end
Tool.Activated:connect(Activated) Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris") InsertService = game:GetService("InsertService")
CoffinModel = InsertService:LoadAsset(179174097) Coffin = CoffinModel:GetChildren()[1]:Clone() if CoffinModel and CoffinModel.Parent then CoffinModel:Destroy() end
ZombieModel = InsertService:LoadAsset(180205370) Zombie = ZombieModel:GetChildren()[1]:Clone() if ZombieModel and ZombieModel.Parent then ZombieModel:Destroy() end
SpecialReady = true SpecialActive = false
Damage = 10 ReloadTime = 0.25 SpecialReloadTime = 60
AnimPlaying = nil
ControlFunction = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ControlFunction") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ControlFunction.Name = "ControlFunction" ControlFunction.Parent = Tool
Tool.Enabled = true
ControlFunction.OnServerInvoke = (function(Player, Mode, Value) if Mode == "AnimationPlaying" and not AnimPlaying then AnimPlaying = Value wait(Value.Duration) AnimPlaying = nil elseif Mode == "KeyDown" and Value == "q" and SpecialReady then Spawn(function() ActivateSpecial() end) return true end return false end)
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
Handle.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if not Hit or not Hit.Parent or not Character then return end local HitParent = Hit.Parent if HitParent:IsA("Hat") or HitParent:IsA("Tool") then HitParent = HitParent.Parent end if Hit.Parent == Character then return end local RightArm = Character:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if not RightArm then return end local RightGrip = RightArm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if not RightGrip or (RightGrip.Part0 ~= Handle and RightGrip.Part1 ~= Handle) then return end local humanoid = HitParent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and humanoid ~= Humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 then UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) humanoid:TakeDamage((AnimPlaying and AnimPlaying.Damage) or Damage) end end)
function TransformModel(Objects, Center, NewCFrame, Recurse) Objects = ((type(Objects) ~= "table" and {Objects}) or Objects) for i, v in pairs(Objects) do if v:IsA("BasePart") then v.CFrame = NewCFrame:toWorldSpace(Center:toObjectSpace(v.CFrame)) end if Recurse then TransformModel(v:GetChildren(), Center, NewCFrame, true) end end end
function CreateCoffin(CoffinModel, Center, Pos) local CoffinClone = Coffin:Clone() CoffinClone.Parent = CoffinModel Pos = CFrame.new(Pos.p, Center) * CFrame.Angles(0, (math.pi / 2), 0) Pos = Pos + Vector3.new(0, ((CoffinClone:GetModelSize().Y / 2) - (Torso.Size.Y * 1.5)), 0) TransformModel({CoffinClone}, CoffinClone:GetModelCFrame(), Pos, true) local ModelCFrame = CoffinClone:GetModelCFrame() TransformModel({CoffinClone}, CoffinClone:GetModelCFrame(), (CFrame.new(ModelCFrame.p, Vector3.new(Torso.Position.X, ModelCFrame.p.Y, Torso.Position.Z)) * CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi, 0)), true) return CoffinClone end
function SpawnCoffins(Center)
local CoffinModel = Instance.new("Model") CoffinModel.Name = "Coffins" Debris:AddItem(CoffinModel, 20) CoffinModel.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace")
local NumberOfCoffins = 8 local Increment = ((math.pi * 2) / NumberOfCoffins) local LookVector = CFrame.new(Center).lookVector local PosX = (10 * LookVector.x) local PosZ = (10 * LookVector.z) local Pos = Vector3.new((Center.x + PosX), Center.y, (Center.z + PosZ)) local Coffins = {}
for i = 1, NumberOfCoffins do local Coffin = CreateCoffin(CoffinModel, Center, CFrame.new(Pos)) local Angle = (Increment * i) table.insert(Coffins, Coffin) Pos = Vector3.new(((Pos.x - Center.x) * math.cos(Angle)) - ((Pos.z - Center.z) * math.sin(Angle)) + Center.x, Center.y, ((Pos.x - Center.x) * math.sin(Angle)) + ((Pos.z - Center.z) * math.cos(Angle)) + Center.z) end
return Coffins
end
function ActivateSpecial() if not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 or not Torso then return end SpecialActive = true SpecialReady = false Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0 wait(0.5) if not Equipped then return end local Zombies = {} Spawn(function() local Coffins = SpawnCoffins(Torso.Position) for i, v in pairs(Coffins) do if v and v.Parent then local CoffinBottom = v:FindFirstChild("CoffinBottom") if CoffinBottom then local Smoke = Instance.new("Smoke") Smoke.Color = BrickColor.new("Institutional white").Color Smoke.Opacity = 0.25 Smoke.RiseVelocity = 0.25 Smoke.Size = 2 Smoke.Enabled = true Debris:AddItem(Smoke, 8) Smoke.Parent = CoffinBottom end end end for i, v in pairs(Coffins) do if v and v.Parent then local ZombieClone = Zombie:Clone() local Creator = ZombieClone:FindFirstChild("Creator") if Creator then Creator.Value = Player end table.insert(Zombies, {Zombie = ZombieClone, Coffin = v}) local CoffinSize = v:GetModelSize() local CoffinCFrame = v:GetModelCFrame() local ZombieSize = ZombieClone:GetModelSize() for ii, vv in pairs(ZombieClone:GetChildren()) do if vv:IsA("BasePart") then vv.Anchored = true end end Debris:AddItem(ZombieClone, 30) ZombieClone.Parent = v TransformModel({ZombieClone}, ZombieClone:GetModelCFrame(), ((CoffinCFrame + Vector3.new(0, ((CoffinSize.Z / 2) - (ZombieSize.Y / 2)), 0)) * CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi, 0)), true) end end wait(3) local MaximumInterval = 100 for i = 1, MaximumInterval do for ii, v in pairs(Coffins) do if v and v.Parent then local CoffinCover = v:FindFirstChild("CoffinCover") if CoffinCover then local CoverSize = CoffinCover:GetModelSize() local CoverCFrame = CoffinCover:GetModelCFrame() TransformModel({CoffinCover}, CoverCFrame, (CoverCFrame - Vector3.new(0, (CoverSize.Z / MaximumInterval), 0)), true) end if i == MaximumInterval then local CoffinTop = CoffinCover:FindFirstChild("CoffinTop") if CoffinTop then CoffinTop.CanCollide = false end end end end wait(0.01) end wait(2) local MaximumInterval = 10 for i = 1, MaximumInterval do for ii, v in pairs(Zombies) do if v.Zombie and v.Zombie.Parent and v.Coffin and v.Coffin.Parent then local CoffinSize = v.Coffin:GetModelSize() local CoffinCFrame = v.Coffin:GetModelCFrame() local ZombieSize = v.Zombie:GetModelSize() local ZombieCFrame = v.Zombie:GetModelCFrame() local NewCFrame = (ZombieCFrame + CoffinCFrame.lookVector * -((((CoffinSize.Z / 2) + (ZombieSize.Z / 2)) / 2) / i)) TransformModel({v.Zombie}, ZombieCFrame, NewCFrame, true) end end wait(0.01) end for i, v in pairs(Zombies) do if v.Zombie and v.Zombie.Parent and v.Coffin and v.Coffin.Parent then local CoffinSize = v.Coffin:GetModelSize() local ZombieSize = v.Zombie:GetModelSize() local ZombieCFrame = v.Zombie:GetModelCFrame() local NewCFrame = ZombieCFrame - Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) TransformModel({v.Zombie}, ZombieCFrame, NewCFrame, true) end end for i, v in pairs(Zombies) do if v.Coffin and v.Coffin.Parent then Debris:AddItem(v.Coffin, 4) end if v.Zombie and v.Zombie.Parent then v.Zombie.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") for ii, vv in pairs(v.Zombie:GetChildren()) do if vv:IsA("BasePart") then vv.Anchored = false end end local torso = v.Zombie:FindFirstChild("Torso") v.Zombie.Humanoid.Jump = true local BodyGyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") Debris:AddItem(BodyGyro, 3) BodyGyro.Parent = torso end end end) wait(2) Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 SpecialActive = false wait(SpecialReloadTime) SpecialReady = true end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not Character or not Player or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 or not Torso then return end Equipped = true end
function Unequipped() Equipped = false Character = nil if Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent then Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)
